Uses of Interface
nachos.machine.SerialConsole

Packages that use SerialConsole
nachos.machine Provides classes that implement the Nachos simulated machine. 
nachos.security Provides classes that can be used to protect the host system from malicious Nachos kernels. 
nachos.userprog Provides classes that allow Nachos to load and execute single-threaded user programs in separate address spaces. 
 

Uses of SerialConsole in nachos.machine
 

Classes in nachos.machine that implement SerialConsole
 class GraphicalConsole
          A graphical console that uses the AWT to put a console in a window.
 class NullConsole
          A null console device.
 class StandardConsole
          A text-based console that uses System.in and System.out.
 

Methods in nachos.machine that return SerialConsole
static SerialConsole Machine.console()
          Return the hardware console.

Methods in nachos.security with parameters of type SerialConsole
